title: fix: replace misleading KPI metric, add deployment docs
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Better bean counting
gist.blurb: We realized our math was a bit fuzzy on the purchase metrics. Swapped out a misleading formula for a solid Purchase Rate.
gist.summary: Updated the internal KPI dashboard to calculate purchase rate based on weekly active users instead of unrelated activation cohorts.
gist.impact: Provides the team with accurate conversion data to better understand pollen pack usage.
gist.visual_concept: Internal metrics dashboard. The Nomnom creature is analyzing a chart while Polly the bee adjusts the trend line. Represents fixing the data visualization.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the round nomnom creature studying a pixelated line graph on a whiteboard. The bee mascot hovers nearby holding a red marker. Lime green (#ecf874) and soft lavender gradient background. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi office vibes. Text in pixel font: 'DATA'. Nostalgic and cute.
